sentences.english: Jam Ho is on Facebook. Join Facebook to connect with Jam Ho and others you may know.
sentences.chinese: 吴昭仪也是个平凡人，是跟你我一样的小人物。

sentences.english: A geat man is always willing to be little.
sentences.chinese: 伟大的人物总是愿意当小人物。

sentences.english: See, us thumb-slummers and box-jumpers, we get a little puckish when it comes to cars, you know?
sentences.chinese: 看，我们这些穷鬼和小人物，当看到车就会有点激动。

sentences.english: Rai Hu is on Facebook. Join Facebook to connect with Rai Hu and others you may know.
sentences.chinese: 李宥蓁也是个平凡人，是跟你我一样的小人物。

sentences.english: Aya Ko is on Facebook. Join Facebook to connect with Aya Ko and others you may know.
sentences.chinese: 赵婉妤也是个平凡人，是跟你我一样的小人物。

sentences.english: Yap Ws is on Facebook. Join Facebook to connect with Yap Ws and others you may know.
sentences.chinese: 林姿杏也是个平凡人，是跟你我一样的小人物。

sentences.english: They are nobodies who think they are somebodies.
sentences.chinese: 他们是一些自以为了不起的小人物。

sentences.english: Kai Yu is on Facebook. Join Facebook to connect with Kai Yu and others you may know.
sentences.chinese: 吕嘉维也是个平凡人，是跟你我一样的小人物。

sentences.english: He seemed to be a little man without a care.
sentences.chinese: 他似乎是一个没有烦事的小人物。

sentences.english: Try Wen is on Facebook. Join Facebook to connect with Try Wen and others you may know.
sentences.chinese: 黄韵珊也是个平凡人，是跟你我一样的小人物。

sentences.english: The dramatist is good at reflecting social life through a portrayal of minor characters fate.
sentences.chinese: 夏衍善于通过对小人物命运的刻划来反映社会生活。

sentences.english: Nico Ni is on Facebook. Join Facebook to connect with Nico Ni and others you may know.
sentences.chinese: 张凯维也是个平凡人，是跟你我一样的小人物。

sentences.english: It's a tight little character arc that fleshes out a bit player.
sentences.chinese: 总而言之，这个小人物的紧凑剧情让它变得无比鲜活。

sentences.english: He is “the clever little guy who outsmarts big bullies”.
sentences.chinese: 丁丁是“比外形高大的恶棍聪明的小人物”。

sentences.english: Wen Zi is on Facebook. Join Facebook to connect with Wen Zi and others you may know.
sentences.chinese: 蔡昌豪也是个平凡人，是跟你我一样的小人物。

sentences.english: Even a dog has its day.

definition: person/character (in a play, novel etc)/protagonist/CL:個|个[ge4]
poor people (idiom)/those who live from hand to mouth
every living being (Buddhism)/the mass of common people

marginalized people (not part of mainstream society)/marginal man (term coined by social psychologist Kurt Lewin, referring to a person in transition between two cultures or social groups, not fully belonging to either)
joys and sorrows/partings and reunions/the vicissitudes of life
hero (of a novel or film)/main protagonist
down and out/in dire straits/unrestrained/unconventional/also pr. [luo4 tuo4]
